analysis.description:
Lockup6m.payIn (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#214-237) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lock.balance == amount
	- amount == 0

Lockup6m.payIn (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#214-237) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lock.balance == amount
	- amount == 0
Lockup6m.payOut (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#238-258) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount == 0

Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#105-115) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#114)

Reentrancy in Lockup6m.payIn (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#214-237):
	External calls:
	- amount = ERC20Interface(asset).balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#224-226)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lock (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#236-237)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#42:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/23/0x3846f81d9b0f546aaab3d6180402b00d3cb5d567.sol#1): it allows old versions
